Uses of Class
org.miktim.websocket.WsParameters

    • Uses of WsParameters in org.miktim.websocket

      Methods in org.miktim.websocket that return WsParameters 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WsParameters WsConnection.getParameters()
      Returns the connection parameters.
      WsParameters WsServer.getParameters()
      Returns the server-side connection parameters.
      WsParameters WsParameters.setBacklog(int num)
      Sets maximum number of pending connections on the server socket.
      WsParameters WsParameters.setConnectionSoTimeout(int millis, boolean ping)
      Sets connection Socket timeout and ping enabled.
      WsParameters WsParameters.setHandshakeSoTimeout(int millis)
      Sets open/close WebSocket handshake timeout.
      WsParameters WsParameters.setMaxMessageLength(int len)
      Sets incoming WebSocket message max length.
      WsParameters WsParameters.setMaxMessages(int maxMsgs)
      Sets the maximum number of pending incoming messages per connection.
      WsParameters WsParameters.setPayloadBufferLength(int len)
      Sets the maximum payload length of the outgoing message frames.
      WsParameters WsParameters.setSSLParameters(SSLParameters sslParms)
      Sets TLS connection parameters.
      WsParameters WsParameters.setSubProtocols(String[] subps)
      Sets supported (server) or requested (client) subprotocols.
      Methods in org.miktim.websocket with parameters of type WsParameters 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WsConnection WebSocket.connect(String uri, WsConnection.Handler handler, WsParameters wsp)
      Creates and starts WebSocket client connection.
      WsServer WebSocket.startSecureServer(int port, WsConnection.Handler handler, WsParameters wsp)
      Creates and starts WebSocket server for TLS connections.
      WsServer WebSocket.startServer(int port, WsConnection.Handler handler, WsParameters wsp)
      Creates and starts WebSocket server for insecure connections
      See: WebSocket.startSecureServer(int, WsConnection.Handler, WsParameters)
